items.sentence: If you do what I want you to, I'll give you this.
She's well-informed, so she might know something.
I dropped my shopping bag and broke all the eggs.
You aren't very good at speaking French, are you?
You would look ridiculous in your mother's dress.
Tom was the first in his family to go to college.
Tom ate the brownies that Mary had baked for him.
Tom was the first person to ask me that question.
Tom was the first one to encourage me to do that.
Tom was the one who told me he needed to do that.
Tom isn't in the cafeteria. I wonder where he is.
Tom was the one who told me he shouldn't do that.
I couldn't help but notice how beautiful you are.
I haven't written a letter to Tom in a long time.
Tom swerved off the road to avoid hitting a deer.
Tom was sick last week and couldn't go to school.
Tom was the one who told Mary what she had to do.
Tom didn't know how to respond to Mary's request.
Do you really think that Tom is better than I am?
There were three empty wine bottles on the table.
The leaves on the trees change color in the fall.
When are you going to tell Tom about what we did?
I had a hunch something good was about to happen.
I had a bad cough, so I took the bitter medicine.
It doesn't matter how old you get, you can learn.
I don't know about Tom, but I'm not OK with this.
Tom splashed cold water on my face to wake me up.
I suspect Tom and Mary are determined to do that.
I know Tom will be gone by the time we get there.
Please promise me that you won't do that anymore.
I weigh about three kilograms less than Tom does.
I know you don't like me as much as you like Tom.
Tom let Mary know that he didn't want to do that.
I don't think that I'll be able to lift that box.
You see that tall building over there, don't you?
There are a lot of stars larger than our own sun.
It's likely Tom doesn't know Mary's phone number.
I don't think that Tom could get Mary to do that.
You should let Tom know Mary is going to do that.
Tom had never imagined Mary would react this way.
Tom didn't know Mary had decided to quit her job.
Tom already knows Mary is planning on doing that.
I wonder whether Tom knows Mary wants to do that.
I wonder whether Tom knows Mary needs to do that.
I wonder whether Tom knew Mary wanted to do that.
I know that you still blame Tom for Mary's death.
I don't think that Tom is as stubborn as Mary is.
Tom was in his room all afternoon, playing games.
It'll only take you about three hours to do that.
It would be a good idea to do that by yourselves.
